com.github.brunothg.game.engine.d2.scene

Class ScaleScene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.brunothg.game.engine.d2.scene.ScaleScene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public abstract class ScaleScene
extends Object
implements Scene
    This scene guarantees a fixed width and height. Be careful with transformations - you should not overwrite existing transformations.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns
